      Subclasses of GridColumn in com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.column 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionGridColumn
      A Grid header type which renders an icon, or a series of icons in a grid cell, and offers a scoped click handler for each icon.
      class  BooleanGridColumn
      A Column definition class which renders boolean data fields
      class  DateGridColumn
      A Column definition class which renders a passed date according to the default locale, or a configured format.
      class  NumberGridColumn
      A Column definition class which renders a numeric data field according to a format string.
      class  RowNumbererColumn
      A Column definition class which renders a numeric data field according to a format string.
      class  TemplateGridColumn
      A Column definition class which renders a value by processing a DataModel's data using a configured XTemplate.
